synopsis.text: Tooru and Ruri, a high school couple bound by love and loss, find their world turned upside down when Ruri's hidden royal lineage to the Pulsean Moon is revealed by a popular J-pop band. As assassins descend upon her, Tooru is gravely injured while shielding Ruri, pushing her into a desperate quest to save him. Transported to the Pulsean Moon through a magical mirror, Ruri must navigate a dangerous battle for the moon's fate while seeking the salvation of her beloved Tooru. Based on the manga by Mito Orihara, this anime combines romance, adventure, and mystery for an enthralling experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
